duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform and oversee a full range of laboratory tests, confirming accuracy of test results and reporting findings to pathologists and clinicians.
Serve as a resource for technical support, research new tests, and resolve technical problems in laboratory testing.
Oversee periodic review of quality control, instrumentation logs, and gather monthly QC statistics.
Manage and direct workflow, reallocating resources as needed, and train medical technologists.
Provide leadership in the absence of Clinical Managers, represent the laboratory on committees, and address personnel issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Medical Laboratory, Life Sciences, or Medical Technology required. ASCP or NCA certification preferred, with 5-8 years of related work experience.
